    • Method Detail

      • addModuleDirectory

        boolean addModuleDirectory(java.lang.String path)
        Add a directory to be scanned for available modules. Sub directories should not be scanned in most cases.
        Parameters:
        path - The directory path to be added
        Returns:
        true iff the path is a valid directory and will be scanned on future refreshes

      • refreshModules

        void refreshModules()
        Refreshes the available modules, canning the directories provided and updating references as required

      • getAvailableModules

        java.util.List<ComponentManager.ModuleSummary> getAvailableModules()
        Provides a list of ComponentManager.ModuleSummarys for the loaded modules.
        Returns:
        A List<ComponentManager.ModuleSummary> of loaded modules.

      • createObjectOfModule

        int createObjectOfModule(int moduleID)
        Instantiate an object of the specified module type
        Parameters:
        moduleID - The type of object to create
        Returns:
        The ID of the created object or -1 if an error occurred

      • getAvailableObjects

        java.util.List<ComponentManager.InstanceSummary> getAvailableObjects()
        Provides a list of instantiated objects
        Returns:
        A List of object summaries

      • getObjectByID

        StrongReference<Interface> getObjectByID(int instanceID)
        Retrieve a reference to an object with the given ID
        Parameters:
        instanceID - the ID of the object to be retrieved
        Returns:
        A StrongReference to the requested object, or null if an error occurs
